text: Robert John Rose (February 28, 1930 â€“ March 2, 2022) was an American prelate of the Roman Catholic Church. Rose was the Bishop of the Diocese of Gaylord in Michigan from 1981 to 1989 and Bishop of the Diocese of Grand Rapids in Michigan from 1989 to 2003. Rose was born in Grand Rapids, Michigan. Rose died on March 2, 2022 at the age of 92. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American Roman Catholic bishops Category:People from Grand Rapids, Michigan
title: Robert John Rose
